about_the_game:
One day the sky came falling down, ripping the world apart. The world used to be Humans and Creatures living in peace. But after the fall, many Creatures turned on the others. A Father who lost his family in this event by one of the Creatures, seeks revenge against the one behind it all. From then on, he sees all Creatures as enemies. 

Along his path he comes across many people that would help him on his revenge quest. Though not many fighters remain. 

Finding great weapons that would make him unstoppable against any who faces him. 

Though he would have to go through all the big leaders to get to the one behind it all. 

A fast-paced fighting with slow flow and progression makes Trek.

This game's story is not yet complete and there will be expansions coming to the game with many other small patches. A story that will keep building up till it is complete. 

With every expansion comes more bosses, more weapons, and many other exciting stuff.

name: Trek

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4590 or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NIVIDIA GeForce GT 1030 2GB or AMD Radeon RX 550 equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 Home 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-8400 or similar
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660 Ti 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: A fast-paced RPG fighting style combined with short progression creates the unique experience of Trek. In this game you will be able to unlock weapons and items, defeat bosses, and progress through a story of revenge. A human who sees all creatures as enemies.
